allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Trojan protocol server in Rust

- Core Trojan protocol implementation with TCP/WebSocket/gRPC transports
- UDP association support
- TLS encryption support
- TOML configuration file support
- Comprehensive unit tests \(96 tests\)
- CI/CD workflows for testing and multi-platform builds
- Code coverage with tarpaulin
EOF
\)")
